title.narrative: Support to the Health Results Innovation Trust Fund

description.narrative: This activity (Support to the Health Results Innovation Trust Fund) is a component of Support to the Health Results Innovation Trust Fund reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Multilateral organisation' and a budget of £114,225,018. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Health policy and administrative management, Medical research, Basic health care, Infectious disease control, Reproductive health care. , with the following implementing partners: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD), IOD PARC. The start date is 19-06-2009 and the end date is 16-12-2021.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD)
